seo.title: Classic Mini ECU Maps | Tuning Files for Multiple ECUs | Classic Mini DIY
seo.description: Download professionally tuned ECU maps for Classic Mini engines. Compatible with Haltech, Speeduino, MegaSquirt, Emerald, and more. Pay what you want for lifetime updates.
seo.keywords: Classic Mini ECU maps, Mini Cooper tuning, Haltech maps, Speeduino maps, MegaSquirt maps, Emerald ECU, engine tuning, fuel maps, ignition maps
seo.ogTitle: Classic Mini ECU Maps | Tuning Files for Multiple ECUs
seo.twitterTitle: Classic Mini ECU Maps | Multiple ECU Support
seo.twitterDescription: Professional ECU maps for Classic Mini engines with lifetime updates.

maps.description: After years of tuning Classic Mini engines, building custom harnesses, and mapping multiple ECU's, I am proud to release my collection of ECU maps with two options for access. Offering support for many popular ECU's used on Classic Minis, with more added in the future.

purchase.title: Option 1 - Purchase
purchase.description: Purchase the ECU maps directly from the Classic Mini DIY store. This option is perfect for those who want to support the channel and get the maps without having to use Github. This option also comes with priority support via email.

download.title: Option 2 - Download
download.description: Download the ECU maps directly from Github. This option is perfect for those who want to get the maps for free. This option also comes with the ability to contribute to the project by submitting pull requests.

workInProgress.name: Work in progress
workInProgress.description: Currently still in progress being ported to this ECU

updates.title: Latest Updates
updates.error: Error loading update history from Github

supportedEcus.title: Supported ECU's
supportedEcus.subtitle: Support for the ecu you need

archive.title: Classic Mini Archives: Explore Historical Documents & Resources
archive.description: Access our comprehensive Classic Mini archives with historical documents, manuals, registries, and resources. Preserved digital collection for Mini enthusiasts and restorers.
archive.keywords: Classic Mini archives, Mini Cooper manuals, Mini registry, historical documents, Mini restoration, vintage Mini resources, classic car archives
archive.ogTitle: Classic Mini Archives: Explore Historical Documents & Resources
archive.ogDescription: Access our comprehensive Classic Mini archives with historical documents, manuals, registries, and resources. Preserved digital collection for Mini enthusiasts and restorers.
archive.twitterTitle: Classic Mini Archives: Explore Historical Documents & Resources
archive.twitterDescription: Access our comprehensive Classic Mini archives with historical documents, manuals, registries, and resources.
archive.welcome_text: Welcome to the Classic Mini Archives. Here you will find a collection of manuals, collections, guides, and other resources to help you with your classic mini projects. I will be expanding this archive over time to help fill the gaps left by sites slowly going offline.
archive.maintenance_text: Its taken many hours of backwards engineering and reworking these services to make sure they don't die out. If you see any issues, or any areas of improvement please let me know!
archive.description_text: Welcome to the Classic Mini Archives. Here you will find a collection of manuals, collections, guides, and other resources to help you with your classic mini projects. I will be expanding this archive over time to help fill the gaps left by sites slowly going offline.

engines.title: Tech - Engine Sizes and Displacements
engines.description: Determining your engine size can be quite difficult without a reference. Check out the CMDIY standard bore, engine size chart to figure out how big your current engine is, or how big you'd like your next build to be!
engines.description_text: Determining your next engine size can be quite difficult without a reference. Check out the CMDIY standard bore, engine size chart to figure out how big your current engine is, or how big you'd like your next build to be!

index.title: Archive - Wheel Dictionary
index.description: The Classic Mini DIY wheel dictionary is here to help you compare all the different wheel options sold on the Classic Mini. Whether looking for something stock or race inspired learn about your options here.
index.main_heading: The Classic Mini DIY Wheel Dictionary
index.description_text: Looking for that one wheel you saw the other day online but you just cant quite find? That's where the Wheel Dictionary comes in. You can now search for the right wheel for your Classic Mini Cooper. With about 1,000 wheels and growing, we hope you'll be able to find exactly the wheel you are looking for.

add_wheel_card.title: Want to add a wheel?
add_wheel_card.description: Click here to complete our wheel submission form to get it added to our list.

footer.title: All data collected and currated by Jan W. from Mini-Forum.de.
footer.description: Looking for that one wheel you saw the other day online but you just cant quite find? That's where the Wheel Library comes in. Using the same data from the now retired site, www.wheeldictionary.net you can search for the right wheel for your Classic Mini Cooper. With lots wheels in the library and growing, we hope you'll be able to find exactly the wheel you are looking for.

registry.title: Archive - The Classic Mini Register
registry.description: Complete compendium of all known minis, as submitted by their owners.
registry.subtitle: Minis added, and growing every day!
registry.description_text: After watching many of the long standing Classic Mini Registry's start to go offline, or no longer get maintained. I decided it was time to stand something up I know will be here and maintained for many years to come. Classic Mini DIY is proud to now provide a free online register for all Classic Mini's of all model years and styles.

technical.title: Classic Mini Technical Toolbox | DIY Calculators & Specifications
technical.description: Classic Mini technical tools and specifications for DIY mechanics. Access calculators, torque specs, needle charts, and more to maintain and upgrade your Mini.
technical.keywords: Classic Mini technical tools, Mini Cooper specifications, SU needle chart, compression calculator, torque specs, DIY Mini maintenance, technical reference
technical.ogTitle: Classic Mini Technical Toolbox | DIY Calculators & Specifications
technical.ogDescription: Classic Mini technical tools and specifications for DIY mechanics. Access calculators, torque specs, needle charts, and more to maintain and upgrade your Mini.
technical.twitterDescription: DIY technical tools and specifications for Classic Mini maintenance and upgrades.

structured_data.name: Classic Mini Technical Toolbox
structured_data.description: Collection of technical tools, calculators, and specifications for Classic Mini maintenance and upgrades.

technical.welcome_text: One of the most important parts of Classic Mini DIY is the focus on getting out and working on your own car. So to make this easier for you, I have collected technical information from various sources and consolidated it right here on classicminidiy.com. These tools and calculators will help you maintain, upgrade, and troubleshoot your Classic Mini with confidence. From compression ratios to needle charts, everything you need is at your fingertips.
technical.description_text: One of the most important parts of Classic Mini DIY is the focus on getting out and working on your own car. So to make this easier for you, I have collected technical information from various sources and consolidated it right here on classicminidiy.com. These tools and calculators will help you maintain, upgrade, and troubleshoot your Classic Mini with confidence. From compression ratios to needle charts, everything you need is at your fingertips.
